argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m v

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcoop.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lcoop.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | lcoop.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( M e. X -> M e. _V ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. X /\ V e. ~P B ) -> M e. _V ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_pweqi | |- ~P B = ~P ( Base ` M ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( V e. ~P B <-> V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_biimpi | |- ( V e. ~P B -> V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. X /\ V e. ~P B ) -> V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` M ) e. _V |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 12 |  | #P_rabexg | |- ( B e. _V -> { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } e. _V ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( M e. X /\ V e. ~P B ) -> { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } e. _V ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` m ) = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 15 | 14, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` m ) = B ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( Base ` m ) = B ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( Scalar ` m ) = ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ) |
| 20 | 2 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 21 | 3, 20 | #P_eqtri | |- R = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = R ) |
| 23 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> v = V ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ^m v ) = ( R ^m V ) ) |
| 25 | 17 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( m = M -> ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ) |
| 26 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( m = M -> S = ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( m = M -> ( Scalar ` M ) = S ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( m = M -> ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) = ( 0g ` S ) ) |
| 29 | 25, 28 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( m = M -> ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = ( 0g ` S ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) = ( 0g ` S ) ) |
| 31 | 30 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( s finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) <-> s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( linC ` m ) = ( linC ` M ) ) |
| 33 | 32 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( linC ` m ) = ( linC ` M ) ) |
| 34 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> s = s ) |
| 35 | 33, 34, 23 | #P_oveq123d | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) |
| 36 | 35 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( c = ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) <-> c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) ) |
| 37 | 31, 36 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( ( s finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) ) <-> ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) ) ) |
| 38 | 24, 37 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> ( E. s e. ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ^m v ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) ) <-> E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) ) ) |
| 39 | 16, 38 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( m = M /\ v = V ) -> { c e. ( Base ` m ) | E. s e. ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ^m v ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) ) } = { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } ) |
| 40 | 14 | #P_pweqd | |- ( m = M -> ~P ( Base ` m ) = ~P ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 41 |  | #P_df-lco | |- LinCo = ( m e. _V , v e. ~P ( Base ` m ) |-> { c e. ( Base ` m ) | E. s e. ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ^m v ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` m ) v ) ) } ) |
| 42 | 39, 40, 41 | #P_ovmpt2x | |- ( ( M e. _V /\ V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) /\ { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } e. _V ) -> ( M LinCo V ) = { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } ) |
| 43 | 5, 9, 13, 42 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( M e. X /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( M LinCo V ) = { c e. B | E. s e. ( R ^m V ) ( s finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ c = ( s ( linC ` M ) V ) ) } ) |
